item.title: 意大利计划由国家支持的意大利电信交易以终止 CVC、Iliad 的交易
item.description: 在包括 CVC Capital Partners Plc 和法国的 Iliad SA 在内的国际投资者围绕着电话运营商意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）转来转去时，意大利正在寻求国内的替代方案。【原文：Italy is pushing for a domestic alternative to international investors including CVC Capital Partners Plc and France’s Iliad SA circling around phone carrier Telecom Italia SpA.】

item.title: 法国马克龙称欧盟赤字规则已过时
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙在接受《金融时报》采访时说，在欧盟需要投资国防和数字化转型之际，欧盟的财政规则已经 "过时"。【原文：The European Union’s fiscal rules are “obsolete” at a time when it needs to invest in defense and the digital transition, French President Emmanuel Macron said in an interview with the Financial Times.】

item.title: 英国法院称对冲基金 Altana 滥用合资伙伴的商业机密
item.description: 根据伦敦一家法院的裁决，对冲基金 Altana Wealth Ltd. 从与一家投资公司的合资交易中获取了商业机密，并将其滥用于建立自己的利润丰厚的基金。【原文：Hedge fund Altana Wealth Ltd. took trade secrets from a soured joint venture deal with an investment firm and misused them to set up its own lucrative fund, according to a London court ruling.】

item.title: 这就是人们如此钟爱黄金的原因
item.description:
闪闪发光的黄色金属是什么？【原文：

What is it about the shiny yellow metal?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：这就是为什么人们如此钟情于黄金 (播客)
item.description: 黄金价格基本上创下了历史新高。但黄金究竟有什么魅力让人们如此钟爱？为什么人们总是对一种没有实际工业用途的金属情有独钟？拥有或佩戴黄金又代表着什么？在本期播客中，我们采访了位于纽约市钻石区的珠宝店 TraxNYC 的创始人马克苏德-阿加贾尼（Maksud Agadjani）。您可能在电影《Uncut Gems》中认识马克苏德，他在电影中扮演了一个与自己相似的角色，在瞬息万变的贵金属世界中工作。【原文：The price of gold is basically at record highs. But what is it about gold that people love so much? Why have people always craved a metal that has no real industrial uses? And what does owning or wearing gold represent? On this episode of the podcast, we speak with Maksud Agadjani, the founder of TraxNYC, a jewelry store based in NYC’s Diamond District. You may recognize Maksud from the movie Uncut Gems, where he played a character similar to himself, working in the fast-moving world of precious】

item.title: Gigaclear 和贷款人利用债务顾问筹集新资金
item.description: Gigaclear Ltd. 及其贷款人正在聘请顾问，以寻求资金继续在英国各地铺设光纤网络。【原文：Gigaclear Ltd. and its lenders are hiring advisers as the company seeks funding to continue rolling out its fiber network across the UK.】

item.title: 贝恩同意收购 PAI 投资的设施管理公司 Apleona
item.description: 贝恩资本同意从私募股权公司 PAI Partners 手中收购德国设施管理公司 Apleona Group GmbH。【原文：Bain Capital agreed to acquire German facilities management company Apleona Group GmbH from private equity firm PAI Partners.】

item.title: 芬兰提议雷恩连任央行行长
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）将连任芬兰中央银行行长，任期七年。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn is set to be appointed for a second seven-year term as the governor of Finland’s central bank.】

item.title: 中国高榕创投向加密独角兽企业投资 3000 万美元
item.description: 高榕创投（Gaorong Ventures）向香港最大的持牌加密货币交易所运营商投资了3000万美元，这是中国风险投资巨头涉足3万亿美元数字资产领域的一个罕见例子。【原文：Gaorong Ventures has invested $30 million in the operator of Hong Kong’s biggest licensed crypto exchange, a rare example of a Chinese venture powerhouse dabbling into the $3 trillion digital asset arena.】

item.title: 美国关税担忧减弱，亚洲货币出现转机
item.description: 由于有迹象表明美国的对等关税至少需要数周才能实施，贸易战的不安情绪有所缓解，大多数亚洲货币有望在本周结束时走高。【原文：Most Asian currencies were poised to end the week higher as trade war jitters eased amid signs that reciprocal US tariffs would take at least weeks to be implemented.】

item.title: 塔塔视频部门转播全球 80% 的体育赛事
item.description: 塔塔通信有限公司（Tata Communications Ltd.）一位高层管理人员表示，由于 2022 年收购了一家美国现场制作和视频传输公司，该公司现在负责录制和转播全球 80% 的体育赛事。【原文：Tata Communications Ltd. is now responsible for recording and broadcasting 80% of the world’s sporting events thanks to the 2022 acquisition of a US-based live production and video transmission firm, a top executive said.】

item.title: 南非警方再逮捕两名涉嫌斯坦霍夫欺诈案的嫌疑人
item.description: 南非警方又逮捕了两名涉嫌在斯坦霍夫国际控股公司（Steinhoff International Holdings NV）进行欺诈的嫌疑人，这些欺诈行为导致这家全球零售商在 2017 年濒临倒闭。【原文：South African police arrested two more suspects in relation to alleged fraud at Steinhoff International Holdings NV that led to the near-collapse of the global retailer in 2017.】

item.title: 新合并的 Zeekr、Lynk&Co 品牌设定了新的 2025 年销售目标
item.description: Zeekr集团是浙江吉利控股集团有限公司旗下电动汽车品牌Zeekr和智能汽车品牌Lynk&Co.的新实体，其目标是在今年销售710,000辆汽车，并再次进军海外市场。【原文：Zeekr Group, the new entity that now houses Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co.’s electric vehicle brand Zeekr and smart car marque Lynk&Co., aims to sell 710,000 units this year and make a renewed push into overseas markets.】

item.title: 激进分子埃利奥特希望结束英国石油公司 15 年来输给壳牌公司的局面
item.description: 几十年来，英国石油公司（BP Plc）和壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）一直是最亲密的竞争对手；两家公司规模相当，在能源市场的影响力不相上下，在全球的影响力也相差无几。【原文：For many decades, BP Plc and Shell Plc were the closest of rivals — equivalent in size, with matching clout in energy markets and similar global reach.】

item.title: 涨幅达 76% 的宏观对冲基金称市场对美国利率定价有误
item.description: 去年收益率高达 76% 的宏观对冲基金的共同管理人表示，市场低估了美国 2026 年降息的潜在幅度。【原文：The market is underpricing the potential magnitude of US interest-rate cuts in 2026, said the co-manager of a macro hedge fund that gained 76% last year.】

item.title: 历峰集团在新一轮董事会人事变动中提升珠宝业大佬的职位
item.description: 历峰集团（Richemont）已将旗下两个最重要和最大的品牌的负责人晋升为主要管理委员会成员，这进一步表明该瑞士奢侈品集团的长期继任变化。【原文：Richemont has promoted the heads of its two most important and largest brands to the main management committee in a further sign of longer-term succession change at the Swiss luxury group.】

item.title: 日本最富有的 3% 人口资产增至创纪录的 3 万亿美元
item.description: 野村综合研究所（Nomura Research Institute Ltd.）的数据显示，日本富豪和超级富豪持有的资产价值已增至创纪录的 469 万亿日元（3.1 万亿美元），而该国大多数人持有的资产增长速度要慢得多。【原文：The value of assets held by Japan’s wealthy and uber wealthy has risen to a record ¥469 trillion ($3.1 trillion), while assets held by the majority of people in the country have grown at a much slower pace, according to Nomura Research Institute Ltd.】

item.title: 奢侈品增速放缓，爱马仕销售额大幅增长
item.description: 爱马仕的销售额攀升，原因是该奢侈品集团受益于假日购物季对其昂贵手袋的旺盛需求。【原文：Hermes sales climbed as the luxury group benefited from a strong appetite for its pricey handbags over the holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将迎来第三周上涨
估计显示芬兰第四季度经济增长乏力
item.description: 芬兰经济连续第四个季度勉强实现增长，预计今年将出现更明显的扩张。【原文：Finland’s economy eked out a gain for a fourth consecutive quarter ahead of a more pronounced expansion that is expected to follow this year.】

item.title: 中国邀请马云和 DeepSeek 创始人会见高层领导
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国已邀请包括阿里巴巴集团联合创始人马云在内的知名企业家与国家最高领导人会面，这可能是在多年动荡之后对私营部门的一次重要支持。【原文：China has invited prominent entrepreneurs including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. co-founder Jack Ma to meet the nation’s top leaders, people familiar with the matter said, a potentially momentous show of support for the private sector after years of turmoil.】

item.title: 越南希望安抚特朗普，誓言对美国商品不设限
item.description: 越南表示无意采取对美 "造成负担或限制贸易 "的措施，并 "准备开放市场，增加对美国农产品的进口"，以避免唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁。【原文：Vietnam says it has no intention of imposing measures that “create burdens or restrict trade” with the US, and is “ready to open its market, increasing imports of US agricultural products,” as it seeks to stave off Donald Trump’s tariff threats.】

item.title: 印度将增加从美国进口石油和液化天然气以规避关税
item.description: 印度正在寻求增加从美国进口石油和天然气，以努力减少两国之间的贸易不平衡，避免潜在的报复性关税。【原文：India is seeking to boost oil and gas imports from the US in an effort to reduce the trade imbalance between the two countries and avoid potential retaliatory tariffs.】

item.title: 国际能源机构称，全球用电量将大幅增加
item.description: 随着世界各地的人们使用更多电力来运行空调、工业和不断增长的数据中心，未来几年的电力需求将急剧增长。【原文：Electricity demand is set to increase sharply in the coming years as people around the world use more power to run air conditioners, industry and a growing fleet of data centers.】

item.title: 世界银行认为支出激增导致泰国财政风险上升
item.description: 世界银行称，泰国为推动经济增长而采取的扩张性财政政策战略面临着老年人护理、投资成本上升的风险，并且需要将公共债务水平保持在可持续的水平上。【原文：Thailand’s pursuit of an expansionary fiscal policy strategy to propel growth faces the risk of rising costs for elderly care, investment and the need to keep public debt level to sustainable levels, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 廉价鹰嘴豆引发印度买家违约
item.description: 在供应大量涌入后，来自头号出口国澳大利亚的鹰嘴豆的印度买家正在拖欠货款或试图重新谈判价格。【原文：Indian buyers of chickpeas from top exporter Australia are defaulting on cargoes or trying to renegotiate prices after an influx of supply.】

item.title: 据说贝恩接近以 40 亿欧元收购 PAI 支持的 Apleona 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本正在就收购德国设施管理公司 Apleona Group GmbH 进行深入谈判，交易价值约为 40 亿欧元（42 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital is in advanced talks to acquire German facility management company Apleona Group GmbH in a deal valued at about €4 billion ($4.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在马克龙的法国，成为一名企业家变得很酷。但它能持久吗？
item.description:
随着有关首席执行官、财富和失败的污名逐渐消失，Mistral 和 H 等AI 的后起之秀激励了新一代创始人。【原文：

AI’s rising stars like Mistral and H have inspired a new generation of founders as the stigma around CEOs, wealth and failure fade. 

】

item.title: 关税男再次出击，市场却视而不见
item.description:
他们认为仍有很大的谈判空间，但全面征税将是另一回事。【原文：

They still see plenty of room for negotiations, but across-the-board levies would be a different story.

】
